verses.verse: "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%>

and I have filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and in understanding, <S%H8394><s%> and in knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and in all kinds of workmanship, <S%H4399><s%>
to devise <S%H2803><s%> skillful works, <S%H4284><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold, <S%H2091><s%> and in silver, <S%H3701><s%> and in brass, <S%H5178><s%>
and in cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> for setting, <S%H4390><s%> and in carving <S%H2799><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in all kinds of workmanship. <S%H4399><s%>

I, <S%H5414><s%> behold, I have appointed with him Oholiab, <S%H171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan; <S%H1835><s%> and in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of all who are <S%H2450><s%> wise-hearted <S%H3820><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> that they may make <S%H6213><s%> all that I have commanded you: <S%H6680><s%>

the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> that is on it, <S%H3627><s%> all the furniture of the Tent, <S%H168><s%>
the table <S%H7979><s%> and its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the pure <S%H2889><s%> lampstand <S%H4501><s%> with all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense, <S%H7004><s%>
the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> with all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its base, <S%H3653><s%>

the finely worked <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>—the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>—the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office,

the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices for the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: <S%H6680><s%> according to all that I have commanded you they shall do. <S%H6213><s%>"

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> also to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H389><s%> 'Most certainly you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my Sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> for it is a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and you throughout your generations; <S%H1755><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifies you. <S%H6942><s%>

You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> therefore; <S%H6944><s%> for it is holy to you. <S%H2490><s%> Everyone who profanes it shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> for whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> therein, <S%H5315><s%> that soul shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done, <S%H6213><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest, <S%H7677><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

Therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> throughout their generations, <S%H1755><s%> for a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

It is a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> for in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he rested, <S%H7673><s%> and was refreshed. <S%H5314><s%>'"

He gave <S%H5414><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> when he finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with him on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets, <S%H3871><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with God <S%H430><s%>'s finger. <S%H676><s%>
